doc:
Al Rodrigo https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Al_Rodrigo 0 Al Rodrigo is an American character actor who has starred in theatre, films and on television since the 1980s. Rodrigo was born in New York City, to Puerto Rican parents. He graduated from the New York City High School of the Performing Arts and received a BFA in theatre from Syracuse University. Some of his film credits include Last Rites, The Glass Shield, Brown's Requiem, The Great White Hype, The Birdcage, and House of Sand and Fog. Theatre credits include Blood Wedding and The Death of Garcia Lorca at the New York Public Theatre, Don Juan of Seville at the Classic Stage Company, The Señorita from Tacna at INTAR, Pericles at Hartford Stage, The Marriage of Figaro at Arizona Theatre Company, Comedy of Errors and Romeo and Juliet at Syracuse Stage, Bandido! at The Mark Taper Forum, and 'La Posada Magica' at South Coast Rep, among many others. Rodrigo has made many guest appearances on TV shows, including Martin, Something Wilder, SeaQuest DSV, Beverly Hills, 90210, ARLI$$, The West Wing, Wanted, High Incident, CSI: Miami, Days of our Lives, and Supernatural. He also guest starred in Star Trek: Deep Space Nine in the season three two-part episode "Past Tense" as Bernardo Calvera. He is now known for playing the role of one of the Star Wars characters in the Expanded Universe "Quinlan Vos" in Season 3 of Star Wars: The Clone Wars. Among some of his many voice over credits are the animated features Bilal, Penguins of Madagascar, Mr. Peabody and Sherman, Coco, and the video games Asura's Wrath, Army of Two: The Devil's Cartel, Tomb Raider, Call of Duty: Black Ops, and Dishonored. He also does extensive work in the ADR community on numerous film and television projects. Al_Rodrigo is an_American_character_actor who has_starred in theatre , films and on television since the_1980s . Rodrigo was_born in New_York_City , to Puerto_Rican_parents . He graduated from the_New_York_City_High_School of the_Performing_Arts and received a_BFA in theatre from Syracuse_University . Some of his_film_credits include Last_Rites , The_Glass_Shield , Brown 's_Requiem , The_Great_White_Hype , The_Birdcage , and House of Sand_and_Fog . Theatre_credits include Blood_Wedding and The_Death of Garcia_Lorca at the_New_York_Public_Theatre , Don_Juan of Seville at the_Classic_Stage_Company , The_Señorita from Tacna at INTAR , Pericles at Hartford_Stage , The_Marriage of Figaro at Arizona_Theatre_Company , Comedy of Errors_and_Romeo and Juliet at Syracuse_Stage , Bandido ! at The_Mark_Taper_Forum , and ' La_Posada_Magica ' at South_Coast_Rep , among many_others . Rodrigo has_made many_guest_appearances on TV_shows , including Martin , Something_Wilder , SeaQuest_DSV , Beverly_Hills , 90210 , ARLI$_$ , The_West_Wing , Wanted , High_Incident , CSI : Miami , Days of our_Lives , and Supernatural . He also guest starred in Star_Trek : Deep_Space_Nine in the_season_three_two-part_episode " Past_Tense " as Bernardo_Calvera . He is_now_known for playing the_role of one of the_Star_Wars_characters in the_Expanded_Universe " Quinlan_Vos " in Season_3 of Star_Wars : The_Clone_Wars . Among some of his_many_voice over credits are the_animated_features_Bilal_,_Penguins of Madagascar , Mr._Peabody and Sherman , Coco , and the_video games Asura 's_Wrath , Army of Two : The_Devil 's_Cartel , Tomb_Raider , Call of Duty : Black_Ops , and Dishonored . He also does extensive_work in the_ADR_community on numerous_film_and_television_projects .
